languages.text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.
languages.original_text: Характеристика Дальний Бой влияет на эффективность атак из оружия дальнего боя, увеличивая шанс попадания и шанс критического попадания. Способности, связанные с боем на расстоянии, обычно усиливаются от высокого значения Дальнего Боя.

traits.locale_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.
Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.
Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

languages.text: Характеристика Дальний Бой влияет на эффективность атак из оружия дальнего боя, увеличивая шанс попадания и шанс критического попадания. Способности, связанные с боем на расстоянии, обычно усиливаются от высокого значения Дальнего Боя.

La Habilidad de proyectiles (HP) aumenta la efectividad de tus ataques con armas a distancia mejorando la probabilidad de impacto y de crítico. Las capacidades de combate a distancia suelen beneficiarse de esta habilidad.
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

traits.locale_text: La Habilidad de proyectiles (HP) aumenta la efectividad de tus ataques con armas a distancia mejorando la probabilidad de impacto y de crítico. Las capacidades de combate a distancia suelen beneficiarse de esta habilidad.

languages.text: 弹道技能可以提高远程武器的攻击效果，提高命中率与暴击率。弹道技能越高，远程战斗能力越强。
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

traits.locale_text: 弹道技能可以提高远程武器的攻击效果，提高命中率与暴击率。弹道技能越高，远程战斗能力越强。

languages.text: 弾道スキル（BS）は遠隔武器による攻撃の効果を高め、命中率とクリティカルヒット率を増加させる。遠隔戦闘アビリティは弾道スキルが高いほどに恩恵を受けることが多い。
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

traits.locale_text: 弾道スキル（BS）は遠隔武器による攻撃の効果を高め、命中率とクリティカルヒット率を増加させる。遠隔戦闘アビリティは弾道スキルが高いほどに恩恵を受けることが多い。

languages.text: Ballistik-Fähigkeit (BF) verbessert die Effektivität von Angriffen mit Fernkampfwaffen und erhöht die Trefferchance und die Chance auf kritische Treffer. Fernkampffähigkeiten profitieren oft von einer hohen Ballistik-Fähigkeit.
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

traits.locale_text: Ballistische Fähigkeit (BF) verbessert die Effektivität von Angriffen mit Fernkampfwaffen und erhöht die Trefferchance und die Chance auf kritische Treffer. Fernkampffähigkeiten profitieren oft von einer hohen Ballistischen Fähigkeit.

languages.text: La Capacité de tir (CT) renforce l'efficacité des attaques menées avec des armes à distance, en améliorant les chances de toucher et les chances de coup critique. Les capacités liées au combat à distance bénéficient souvent d'une Capacité de tir élevée.
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.

traits.locale_text: La Capacité de tir (CT) renforce l'efficacité des attaques menées avec des armes à distance, en améliorant les chances de toucher et les chances de coup critique. Les capacités liées au combat à distance bénéficient souvent d'une Capacité de tir élevée.

languages.text: Balistik Yetenek (BAY), menzilli silahlarla yapılan saldırıların etkililiğini artırarak vuruş olasılığı ile kritik vuruş olasılığını yükseltir. Yüksek Balistik Yetenek, menzilli çatışma kabiliyetlerine de olumlu katkı yapar.
languages.original_text: Ballistic Skill (BS) enhances the effectiveness of attacks with ranged weapons, increasing hit chance and critical hit chance. Ranged combat abilities often benefit from a high Ballistic Skill.
